overview: The plot of the film is the love of a married woman, Anna Karenina, and a young officer, Aleksei Vronsky. Anna leaves the family in search of happiness to her beloved person. She has to take a very serious step in her life - to part with her son. The attitude of the high society towards her is changing. All this brings a lot of pain and humiliation to the main character.  The tragic story of love and betrayal, the fate of a woman, for the sake of passion who decided to change her life irrevocably.
title: Anna Karenina
